I have also noticed many times I was unable to unRAR and there is an easy way to fix that.

Remove the torrent from the list. Close Torrent. Reopen it and get that same torrent again.
It will CHECK then resume fixing the CRC gaps in the RAR files. Sometimes you have to do this a couple times before the RAR will extract properly
